articles.title: Maruti to issue shares worth ₹128 billion to buy 100% stake at Suzuki Motor Gujarat - HT Auto
articles.description: Maruti Suzuki India has informed that its board has approved purchase of 100 per cent of the Suzuki Motors Gujarat (SMG) shares owned by the Japanese auto giant.
articles.content: The auto major has executed the share purchase and subscription agreement (SPSA) with SMC and SMG to acquire 12,84,11,07,500 shares of 10 each, representing 100 per cent equity capital of SMG owned b… [+1520 chars]

articles.title: Rupee Closed at a Lifetime Low on Monday Amid Worries Over Oil Prices - The Wire
articles.description: The rupee closed at 83.2775 against the dollar, barely changed from its previous close, which had marked a record low. The currency hit its previous record closing low of 83.2675 on September 18.
articles.content:
New Delhi: The Indian rupee closed at a lifetime low against the US dollar on Monday (October 16) due to a surge in crude oil prices and weakening Asian currencies.
The rupee closed at 83.2775 again… [+1355 chars]

articles.title: No Risk Of Selloff In Sight For Indian Stocks, Says Kenneth Andrade - BQ Prime
articles.description: Andrade is 'neutral' when choosing between domestic-facing and export-oriented companies.
articles.content:
